Not bad, Winston.
I'll tell you what, man.

and different sounds.[imitates radio beeping

God, I wish marketers
had a uniform.

on the job,
you know what I mean?

[Winston clears throat]

Okay, enough of this

It's time to play hardball.

So I shouldn't be the

That makes sense, bro.

Sharks eat whatever they want.
Dolphins... they jump

through hoops, so, yeah,
I think it does make sense.
No, it's awesome, bro.

Okay, stop mockingly

My uncle was arrested for

What?
What?
Carry on.

Oh, there's councilwoman

She's from our district.
Yummo.

You're welcome.

I'm sorry about

It's an issue

I do charity work

because it would mean

Let me let you in

You're a dear, Fawn.[laughs]

I made a pun and
I didn't know it.

Oh.
Hi.

Schmidt,
this is Fawn Moscato.

Sí, señora.

Hey.
Ooh. What you doing, hot shot?

I was feeling saucy.

Red wine makes you

I'll make you a deal.
When I finish a form,

when I'm done, then we can

Deal.
Hey, I'm not

[sighs]
Oh!

Red wine. Sorry!

To be stabbed by

You're very

Yeah.
